name: Eggnog Cheesecake

ingredients.name: Eggnog Cheesecake Mix
ingredients.additionalInstruction: or cheesecake mix of your choice

preparation: Combine gingersnap or graham wafer crumbs with melted butter.Press into 9" (23 cm) springform pan, or use 2 premade crumb pie shells.
Blend cream cheese with cheesecake mix until smooth. Beat in eggs, one at a time. Add Greek vanilla yogurt and beat until smooth. Pour into crust.
Cheesecake: 40 min/Pies: 30 min. Cool to room temperature, then refrigerate before serving.
